lines.text: Your father wanted you to have this - when you were old enough.
Gosh! Wowee! Jeepers! Golly willickers!
Jeepers! What is it, Augie Ben Doggie? Did you feel a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of voices cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced?
No, just a little headache.

Fluke Starbucker, intergalactic boy wonder. Augie "Ben" Doggie, venerable member of the Redeye Knights. Princess Anne-Droid, interstellar damsel in distress. Ham Salad, ace mercenary pilot and intergalactic wise guy. Darph Nader, villain.
You'll get us all killed!
Well excuuuuuse me!
Hardware Wars! A thrilling space saga of romance, rebellion, and household appliances!
An Imperial steamtrooper!
Uh-oh!
Identification?
Oh, uh, gee, I think I left my ID in my other pants! Look, we're in kind of a hurry! I could...
These aren't the drones you want.
These aren't the drones we want.
You don't want to detain us.
We don't want to detain you.
You will never see a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. Watch your step, son. This place can be a little rough.
Oh, no, it's too weird in here! I - I can't go in here! Look, I'll wait for you outside...
Stay calm, my boy. We've got to find a pilot.
Artie Deco, where are you? At last! Where have you been?
[Ludicrous sound effects]
Secret mission? What plans? What are you talking about? This is madness!
[Ludicrous sound effects]
Wait a minute! Where are you going? They're heading in this direction! What are we going to do? We're doomed for certain!
[Ludicrous sound effects]
Oh, dear! I'm going to regret this!
They're still back there! They're gaining on us! Does this thing do lightspeed?
You bet your asteroids, kid. Hold on!
Enjoy intense drama during the pre-battle briefing scene.

You want to attack at the most vulnerable spot. Come at it from this angle and locate the automatic flip-flop override device here, which in turn will defuse the antigyroscopic preinterface thruster chamber, and the pneumatic centripetal antigravity shield deflectors, then you simply deactivate the axial gyro-presubinertia-photomegatronic oscillator that you see here.
Huh?
You pull the plug!
No! No! You can't destroy innocent people! Basketball's a peaceful planet! Please! We have no weapons!
You'll laugh! You'll cry! You'll kiss three bucks goodbye!

[voiceover]
Fluke. Fluuuke. Trust your feelings, Fluke. And if you can't be good, be careful.
[in the middle of a shootout, Princess Anne-Droid opens an escape door]
We'll go this way. I insist!
[Ham Salad is returning fire with a power drill]
No way, sister! I can handle thi-!
[an enemy shot flies between Ham's legs, hitting the wall behind him. Ham instantly turns and follows the princess]
Okay, I'm with you!
[points to Destruct-O-Vision screen while spouting muffled jibberish]
I don't understand what you're saying! I *can't* understand you! Are you talkin' to *me*?
[Auggie Ben Doggie is in a saber battle with Darph Nader. Fluke, The Princess, and Ham beckon him to escape]
C'mon, Auggie Ben Doggie!
Get to the ship! Run for it!
C'mon! Let's go!

[waving them off]
No, you go on without me... I'll be all right... Don't worry about me...
[they all become disgusted and walk off]
Aw, jeez!
Jeez! What a martyr!
What a martyr, I can't believe this!
Yeah. See ya later, you martyr!
Take it easy kid, it's only a movie.
